txt.en: Somewhere nearby a large door opens
Somewhere nearby a large door opens
Toxic fumes begin to affect you while in the Pits
The Toxic fumes grow in strength
With a loud creak, a large door opens
The Toxic Fumes are almost too much to bear now
A large door slowly creaks open
A Choking Haze spreads to your lungs
'Too deep, you have come.  Your time will run out while the flames burn your corpses!'
The Choking Haze grows in strength
'We were to be left alone!  The pits are closed.  No more trespassers!'
The Choking Haze is almost too much to bear now
'Welcome to my home.  You will be quite a tasty snack!'
Saruman's voice fills your ears, 'Choose wisely...'
